Description.Name: Bearing
Description.Details: A former Khan of Clan Star Adder, Bearing Bearingovich oversaw the its expansion from a relatively minor Clan into a powerhouse within the Kerensky Cluster. Although not able to translate that success into his attempts to claim territory within the Inner Sphere, Bearing nonetheless became one of the Clan's most respected Khans. A fierce military leader, Bearing was also well known for his knowledge of LosTech, even amongst the Clans. Clan records do also note his dislike of advanced Star League era AI however, including his relentless attempts to torture such an AI, one known only as 'RogueBot'. Bearing would eventually use his tech knowledge in the creation of his specialized suit of Rogue Bear Battle Armor, known as BA Baracas. It is with the Baracas Battle Armor that Bearing Bearingovich would call for a Trial of Grievance against Hannibal Banacek for his right to reclaim the Banacek Bloodname.
